metadata.name: goto_frame_swf_3
metadata.description: Tests ActionGotoFrame opcode (0x81) - parses frame index and logs navigation request. Verifies correct bytecode parsing and parameter extraction.
missing_features: Actual frame navigation not implemented (only logs the frame index)
Timeline jump semantics not implemented (go to frame N and stop)
Frame execution order after jump not handled
Stop/play state management after frame jump
Display list updates on frame change
Frame boundary validation (checking if target frame exists)
Proper handling of frame cycling and loops
metadata.implementation_notes: The opcode is correctly parsed from the SWF bytecode and the frame parameter (UI16) is extracted. The runtime function logs the frame navigation request but does not actually perform the jump. Full implementation requires a complete timeline management system with proper frame control flow, which is a larger architectural feature beyond this single opcode.
